description: This file provides an `Env` class to access environment configuration variables loaded from a `.env` file, using the `flutter_dotenv` package. It defines getters for the backend API URL, site URL, and application name.

classes.name: Env
classes.description: A class to access environment variables such as API base URL, site URL, and app name loaded from the `.env` file.

methods.name: apiBaseUrl
methods.description: Returns the backend API base URL from environment variables, or an empty string if not set.

methods.name: siteUrl
methods.description: Returns the site URL for redirects or deep links, or an empty string if not set.

methods.name: appName
methods.description: Returns the application display name, defaulting to 'PicklePlay' if not specified.
